title: Negatives with Be
content: She [is not|not is] happy. We [aren't|not are] going.

title: Negatives with Auxiliaries
content: I [have not|haven't] seen him. She [cannot|can not] swim.
explanationEnUs: Add 'not' after the first auxiliary verb. 'Cannot' is one word.
explanationZhTw: 在第一個助動詞後加 'not'。'Cannot' 是一個詞。
explanationZhCn: 在第一个助动词后加 'not'。'Cannot' 是一个词。

title: Present Simple Negatives
content: He [does not|do not] like apples. I [don't|doesn't] know.
explanationEnUs: Use 'do not' (don't) or 'does not' (doesn't) before the main verb.
explanationZhTw: 在主要動詞前使用 'do not' (don't) 或 'does not' (doesn't)。
explanationZhCn: 在主要动词前使用 'do not' (don't) or 'does not' (doesn't)。

title: Past Simple Negatives
content: We [did not|didn't] go to the party. He [didn't see|didn't saw] me.
explanationEnUs: Use 'did not' (didn't) + base verb for past tense negatives.
explanationZhTw: 過去式否定句使用 'did not' (didn't) + 動詞原形。
explanationZhCn: 过去时否定句使用 'did not' (didn't) + 动词原形。

title: Double Negatives
content: I don't have [any|no] money. I know [nothing|anything] about it.
explanationEnUs: Avoid double negatives. Say 'don't have any' or 'have nothing'.
explanationZhTw: 避免雙重否定。說 'don't have any' 或 'have nothing'。
explanationZhCn: 避免双重否定。说 'don't have any' or 'have nothing'。
